sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Modutils-&modutils-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: ar, as, ld, strip bison: bison diffutils: cmp fileutils: chmod, install, ln, mkdir, mv, rm flex: flex gcc: cc grep: egrep, grep make: make sed: sed sh-utils: expr, uname textutils: cat, tr
